phases.name: Project Initiation & Planning
phases.description: Project setup, requirements gathering, architecture design, and planning activities

phases.name: Infrastructure & DevOps Setup
phases.description: Cloud infrastructure provisioning, CI/CD pipeline setup, development environment configuration

phases.name: Core Backend Development
phases.description: Authentication, authorization, core APIs, database models, and base services

phases.name: Frontend Foundation
phases.description: UI framework setup, component library, routing, state management, and core pages

phases.name: Module Development - Phase 1
phases.description: User Management, Organization Management, and Project Management modules

phases.name: Module Development - Phase 2
phases.description: Workflow Engine, Document Management, and Reporting modules

phases.name: Integration & Advanced Features
phases.description: Third-party integrations, notifications, real-time features, and advanced analytics

phases.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
phases.description: Comprehensive testing, performance optimization, security audits, and bug fixes

phases.name: Deployment & Launch
phases.description: Production deployment, data migration, user training, and go-live activities
